Installation
====================================
.. _installation:

Pyenty was developed and tested using Python 3 (3.4)
and before start using it, install the following tools.

`Tornado Web Framework <https://github.com/tornadoweb/tornado/>`_::

    pip install tornado

`MongoDB Driver - Motor <https://github.com/mongodb/motor/>`_::

    pip install motor

And finally, install Pyenty::

    pip install pyenty


For persistency, pyenty connects (through motor) to highly scalable database `MongoDB <http://www.mongodb.org//>`_.
Download and install the latest version.
